title: [2015 DSE] Can't believe it has been 4 years

replies.msg: I took DSE in 2015 and I still vividly remember the day when the results got released. I was panicking the whole time from May to July, anxiously waiting for the results because I thought I screwed up big time, I even applied to a high diploma program. On that day, my parents drove me to school and I kind of just lost it when I was in the car and I kept crying. I tried to get it together to walked to the classroom and get my results. When I got my report card, I cried again, but those tears are happy tears - I got 2 5**! In both Chinese and English. I still rmb that feeling to this day, and I can't believe it has been 4 years already and now I am almost done with college. I hope 2019 DSEers all have a bright future ahead of them.
最尾揀咗咩科

I still rmb that feeling to this day
